shri lanka krikat pila lowa anka ekata pathkirime aramuna athiwa rajakari katayuthu aarambha kala bawa dharmadasa mahatha ‘dinamina’ta pawasiya.krikat sabhapathiwaraya wada bharagath awasthawedi lekam nishantha ranathunga mahatha athulu widhayaka sabhawe samajikayan pirisakda ekwa sitiyaha.me athara krikat sabhapathi jayantha dharmadasa mahatha ema thanathurata pathwima abhiyogayata lak karamin pawara athi naduwa illa askara ganima pilibanda awasan thiranaya ikmanin prakashayata pathkarana bawa upa sabhapathi mohan da silwa mahatha pawasayi.ee mahatha samaga krikat nilawaranayedi ekwa katayuthu kala pirisage adahasa wimasa kridawa wenuwen yahapath thiranayak prakasha kirimata sudanamin sitina bawa mohan da silwa madhyawedin wetha pawasiya.krikat aayathanayata nawa niladharin pirisak pathwa athi awasthawaka paripalanayata badhawana ayurin katayuthu kirima pala rahitha bawa silwa mahatha penwa dunneya.shri lanka krikat aayathanayedi nawa sabhapathiwaraya wada bharagath awasthawedi lekam nishantha ranathunga mahatha madhyawetha pawasuwe krikat diyunuwata widhayaka sabhawe siyalu denage sahaya balaporoththu wana bawayi.“chandayata kalin wiwidha mathabheda parshawa kihipayak athare thibuna.
eya thula prajathanthrawadaya athulu batahira gunanga sambandhayen siyum patalillak mathuwemin thibe.
sinhala manthriwarun idiripath karana prashnawalata thaman pilithuru nodena bawa uthuru palath pradhana amathya si.wi. wigneshwaran palath sabhawedima prakasha...

ehidi mathiwarana komisame sabhapathiwaraya thawaduratath sandahan kale wadi washayen mathiwarana nithi rithi ullanganaya wu sthana lesa handuna gath pradeshawalata polis wishesha karyala balakayata amatharawa karali mardana eekakaya da yodawana lesa illa siti bawayi.emenma, mathiwaranaya sandaha polisiya menma siwil aarakshaka niladharin da chanda madhyasthanawalata yodawa athi bawayi mathiwarana katayuthu saha sanwidhanathmaka aparadha katayuthu bhara niyojya polispathi priyantha wirasuriya ema madhya hamuwata ekwemin wadiduratath prakasha kale.
